answers.a: A system with two pendulums attached to each other
answers.b: A pendulum that swings in two directions simultaneously
answers.d: A pendulum with twice the mass of a single pendulum

questions.question: Which of the following equations describes the behavior of a double pendulum?
Why is it difficult to predict the behavior of a double pendulum analytically?

answers.a: The double pendulum violates the laws of physics.
answers.b: The double pendulum is an imaginary concept and cannot be observed.
answers.c: The behavior of a double pendulum is chaotic and sensitive to initial conditions.
answers.d: Analytical predictions of a double pendulum require complex mathematical tools not yet developed.

questions.question: Why do we study double pendulums?

answers.a: For a broader understanding of complex and nonlinear systems
answers.b: To understand the linear motion of systems
answers.c: To measure the effect of gravity

questions.question: Which one of the following laws is not applicable to a simple pendulum?

answers.b: Time period is proportional to length l
